page.title: 12Todwick School Playground.
page.content: In the{playground}the boys play {football.}Some girls{skip}and some just walk around talking about T.V. or pop groups. Some people play{'tag'}and {'tag off ground'.}We have a football wall, which is about two metres high, which you can throw a ball at. We also have lines marked on the playground for{netball,}four small games squares, {throwing}and a patch for the{football wall. We have two sheds which are used for storing{rounders}bats, balls, {skipping}ropes, footballs...etc.We also have a small playground which the Infants play in. They have a{hopscotch game marked on the playground. In the summer we are allowed to go on the field which is a large area of grass behind the playground. Here there is a hill called 'The Mountain' which was made from the earth dug when the {swimming pool}was built.
